overview: An honest police officer takes on the mightiest of the crime world. Hrishikesh (Suresh Gopi) is an honest and duty-bound police officer. Believing the power of truth and righteousness, Hrishikesh takes on corrupt sources within the system and also the mightiest people in the world of crime and underworld. Will he remain truthful even in the times of adversity?
title: Aayudham
